RESOURCE.STRING: Gas Throttle Control Test
The Gas Throttle Control Test is used to help isolate and troubleshoot throttle actuator problems by controlling the throttle actuator and monitoring it's response.
Select Start to start the test.
Name
Value
Units
Starting test. Please Wait.
To stop the test select Stop.
Test Passed.
Test Failed. The throttle plate did not move to one or more of the commanded positions. Refer to the Troubleshooting and Repair Manual for further instructions.
Test timed out, restart test if desired.
Test stopped, throttle actuator circuit fault detected.
Test stopped, engine speed detected.
Test stopped by operator.
Engine speed detected. Shutdown engine and restart test
Throttle actuator circuit fault detected. Troubleshoot the throttle actuator circuit fault code before proceeding with this test.
ECM Calibration does not support this test
The test could not be started for unknown reasons.
Cummins INSITE
Instructions
Current Values
Test Status
The test was not started because the Engine Speed is greater than 0.
Test Passed.
Test Failed. The throttle plate did not move to one or more of the commanded positions. Refer to the Troubleshooting and Repair Manual for further instructions.
Test timed out, restart test if desired.
Show

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20100</ErrorNumber><Description>An unknown error occurred within the Gas Throttle Control Test Page.</Description><Suggestion>Please retry the operation or close and restart INSITE.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20101</ErrorNumber><Description>The test was aborted because the Engine Speed is greater than 0.</Description><Suggestion>Engine speed detected Shutdown engine and restart test.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20102</ErrorNumber><Description>The test was a failure because The throttle plate did not move to one or more of the commanded positions.</Description><Suggestion> Refer to the Troubleshooting and Repair Manual for further instructions.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20104</ErrorNumber><Description>Base class initialization failed.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20105</ErrorNumber><Description>Could not Query logic.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>21016</ErrorNumber><Description>Unable to start the Gas Throttle Control Test.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20107</ErrorNumber><Description>Could not register as publisher.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20108</ErrorNumber><Description>Could not register as subscriber.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20109</ErrorNumber><Description>Could not unpublish test events.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart INSITE before attempting to restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20110</ErrorNumber><Description>Could not unsubscribe from receiving system messages.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart INSITE before attempting to restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20111</ErrorNumber><Description>Unable to start the Gas Throttle Control Test.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20112</ErrorNumber><Description>Unable to properly stop the Gas Throttle Control Test.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20113</ErrorNumber><Description>An error occurred while loading a string for the page.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20114</ErrorNumber><Description>The test has been aborted for an unknown reason.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test. If the problem persists, please contact technical support.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20115</ErrorNumber><Description>The test was not started because the Engine Speed is greater than 0.</Description><Suggestion>Please reduce road speed to 0 and try running the test again.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20116</ErrorNumber><Description>The test was not started because ECM Calibration does not support this test.</Description><Suggestion>Refer to the Troubleshooting and Repair Manual for further instructions.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20117</ErrorNumber><Description>The test was aborted because throttle actuator circuit fault was detected.</Description><Suggestion>Refer to the Troubleshooting and Repair Manual for further instructions.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20118</ErrorNumber><Description>Engine speed detected. Shutdown engine and restart test.</Description><Suggestion>Please close and restart the test.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

STRING.Context: Displayed when Feature Enable precondition fails

RESOURCE.STRING: <ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>20119</ErrorNumber><Description>ECM calibration does not support this test.</Description><Suggestion></Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
